title: Will the "One For All" come back any time soon ?
body: Will the "One For All" come back in the 8 season ?

replies.body: I'm not 100% sure if it will come back anytime soon, as I haven't personally heard anything myself. There's a good chance it could pop up at any time as the rotating game mode on the PBE, at which point you can expect it on the live servers as well.
